column5: We cater to medium and longer term (1+ month) guests. Shorter term (week/weekend) booking requests may be considered, but only at the very last minute (within 1 week of planned arrival) ...and WE LOVE TRAVEL NURSES! ;)  **Also, booking requests that move-in shortly (within a week) after my last guest moves out will be given priority, as I need to minimize vacancy gaps. Thank you for understanding**
